tweet: Everyone giving $ZEC shit for not being private enough with optional privacy.  Meanwhile $LTC $XMR and $ETH get hyped for it.  The clutch is none of these will guarantee privacy.  Use $ARRR if you don‘t want to leave any trace of metadata that could be analyzed in the future. 🏴‍☠️
This there actually a privacy protocol that works properly (no backdoors, no tracing, actual privacy) ??  $ZEC $XMR $GRIN $BEAM $XZC $XVG

So far there have been 3 approaches to privacy in cryptocurrencies: Zcash, Monero and Mimblewimble/Grin. In Zcash, your anonymity set is all the shielded transactions (theoretical maximum)  https://t.co/Jht8bc9T64
In Monero, you get to pick your own anonymity set of size 10-25 from any existing on-chain UTXOs. The UTXOs you hide behind are called "decoys".  https://t.co/aNQnsNLLX3

This is not a "new attack." This is just the first time someone has attempted an obvious attack against Grin to break its weak graph protections.  MimbleWimble offers far better privacy than Bitcoin, but it's still far weaker than Monero and Zcash fully-shielded.

$XMR   This is my bullish count for #XMR   Looking across the major alts they look similar to #monero  One more leg down  Please like & share if you find value in these charts  If you guys show enough love I’ll do an update for all the majors this week  🤙  https://t.co/8lqWGJE0yP
